/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and vibrant flowers, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are seen driving on the road, indicating a busy day in the city. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
